mapper.insert: insert into BOARD(MEM_NO,B_TITLE,B_CONTENT,B_THUMBNAIL,B_CREATETIME) values((select MEM_NO from MEMBER where MEM_ID=#{MEM_ID}),#{B_TITLE},#{B_CONTENT},#{B_THUMBNAIL},now())
mapper.select: select MEMBER.MEM_ID,BOARD.* from BOARD join MEMBER using(MEM_NO) order by B_NO desc limit #{Integer}, 6
select MEMBER.MEM_ID,BOARD.* from BOARD join MEMBER using(MEM_NO) where B_NO = ${Integer}
mapper.update: update BOARD set B_VIEW=B_VIEW+1 where B_NO = #{Integer}
update BOARD set B_LIKE=B_LIKE+1 where B_NO = #{Integer}
mapper.insert: insert into COMMENT(MEM_NO,B_NO,C_CONTENT) values((select MEM_NO from MEMBER where MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}),#{B_NO},#{C_CONTENT})
mapper.update: update BOARD set B_COMMENTCOUNT = B_COMMENTCOUNT +1 where B_NO = #{Integer}
mapper.select: select MEMBER.MEM_ID,MEMBER.MEM_PROFILEIMAGE,COMMENT.* from COMMENT join MEMBER using(MEM_NO) where B_NO = #{Integer} order by C_NO desc;
SELECT COALESCE( (select B_NO from BOARD where B_NO < ${B_NO} order by B_NO desc limit 1), -1 ) AS result
